txt.en: 'Well done, [placeholder]! It is a start. A new game will begin shortly -- I do hope you will participate in the next one as well.'
'Well done, [placeholder]! It is a start. A new game will begin shortly -- I do hope you will participate in the next one as well.'
The Stomp-a-Shrew Challenge
Collected boots for shrew-stomping
'You must defeat a number of shrews as well as help with gardening tasks if you wish to impress me.'
You have entered the garden. Make sure you have the shrew-boots slotted on your skill bar

'You will need to be standing in the centre of the garden below if you wish to catch the pesky shrews.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: To slot the boots as a skill, drag the 'Boots of Quite-imaginable Power' item from your inventory to your skill bar.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>Pesky shrews are immune to all other attacks and offensive manoeuvres.</rgb>
The shrews -- they are everywhere! They must be stopped

The boots needed for stomping on shrews can be found near the stairs of the Festival Garden.\n\nYou should collect the boots from the crate and drag them to your skill bar, for they will be needed to deter shrews.
'You will need to be standing in the centre of the garden below if you wish to catch the pesky shrews.'
Drove away pesky shrews ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The pesky shrews can be found in the centre of the garden in Duillond's Festival Garden space, and the shrew-stomping boots are in your inventory.

You should locate the boots in your inventory and slot them as a skill. These boots can be used to stomp on obnoxious shrews infesting the garden. When you have done so, you should wait for the shrew-whacking game to begin in the garden's centre.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: To slot the boots as a skill, drag the 'Boots of Quite-imaginable Power' item from your inventory to your skill bar.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>Pesky shrews are immune to all other attacks and offensive manoeuvres.</rgb>
Planted seedlings in mounds of soil ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The pesky shrews can be found in the centre space of Duillond's Festival Garden.

Logethuil has asked you to defeat many shrews, and also to ensure the protection of the tender young plants attempting to grow in this hostile environment.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: To slot the boots as a skill, drag the 'Boots of Quite-imaginable Power' item from your inventory to your skill bar.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>Pesky shrews are immune to all other attacks and offensive manoeuvres.</rgb>
This round has ended; you did not defeat the shrews in time

The pesky shrews can be found in the centre space of Duillond's Festival Garden.

Logethuil has asked you to defeat many shrews, and also plant seedlings so that the garden may thrive.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: To slot the boots as a skill, drag the 'Boots of Quite-imaginable Power' item from your inventory to your skill bar.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>Pesky shrews are immune to all other attacks and offensive manoeuvres.</rgb>
You have left the garden
Logethuil is in the Garden of Duillond.\n\nYou should bring news of your success to Logethuil.
You have planted a special seedling
Get the shrew-stomping boots from the nearby crate
You have been given boots for stomping on shrews; you should slot these as a skill and enter the garden
Slot the shrew-stomping boots in your skill bar and wait for the onslaught
Drive away pesky shrews ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Plant seedlings in mounds of soil ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat shrews before the round is over
Do not leave the garden's centre
Talk to Logethuil
Speak with Logethuil

The Elves of Duillond have a garden which should be in a lovely state for the Spring Festival. Unfortunately, it has recently been overrun with shrews.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'Do you know what I advise? I advise that you ignore my friends and embark upon the greatest challenge of all. That is the only way you shall earn my respect as an elite gardener.

'When you begin the game, you are responsible for planting and gardening tasks, as well as driving away the dear shrews. If you can manage all of this in the allotted time, you will have truly done as much as you can for our poor little garden.

'Do your best, [placeholder]! The stakes are very high indeed.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: The boots for shrew-stomping will appear in your inventory. You must slot this item into your skill bar, as this attack is the only offence that will work against the pesky shrews of Duillond.</rgb>
